name: Adventure Quad Bike Cab
description:
Let's take a drive on ATV quad bike city taxi. 

Passengers are waiting for their perfect ride so start your ATV quad motorbike and start completing your journey by picking and dropping your passengers on the required destination. Give amazing ATV city motorbike taxi cab ride to more passengers as you need to earn more rewards and coins. Reach upon the call of the passenger. Become a professional ATV bike city taxi cab driver by this quad motorbike city taxi simulator game. Show your amazing motorbike driving skills and prove yourself as a real city taxi driver in this ATV bike city taxi game.

Complete the given missions within the limited time in ATV bike city taxi cab game . Don't make your passengers wait for too long as they are in a hurry to reach their required destination. Drive safely your ATV city taxi motorbike simulator to avoid accidents, carefully drive as there is a lot of traffic in the city. After accomplishment of required missions unlock other missions and upgrade your vehicle in ATV bike city taxi cab driving game. Explore multiple scenes and missions on your ATV quad motorbike taxi simulator. You have to drive your ATV quad extreme bike taxi simulator fast on city roads without the violation of traffic rules and regulations.

Download and enjoy the ultimate fun of ATV motorbike city taxi driving. Drive fast, pick and drop passengers, get rewards and become the professional ATV bike city taxi driver. Follow different steps to start your journey as a real city taxi driver in the town!

Features:

- Pick and drop passengers within the limited time.
- Collect rewards on completing the missions.
- Safely drop the passengers to their destinations.
- Upgrade your vehicle on completion of missions.
- Amazing 3D HD graphics with realistic environment.
- Smooth control gameplay.
- Best sound effects.
- Show your skills as a real bike taxi driver.
- Multiple missions to be faced.
- Variety of ATV quad bikes.
